meanings.definition: A type of ancient writing system using wedge-shaped characters.
meanings.sent1: Archaeologists discovered cuniforms on clay tablets.
meanings.sent2: The historian studied cuniforms to learn about ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent3: The teacher joked that learning cuniforms was like solving a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The cuniforms etched in stone seemed to whisper secrets of the past.
meanings.sent5: The intricate cuniforms were like tiny works of art on the tablet.

meanings.definition: A type of ancient writing system used in Mesopotamia.
meanings.sent1: Students in history class learned about cuniforms in Mesopotamia.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed artifacts with cuniforms from Mesopotamia.
meanings.sent3: The tour guide pretended to read cuniforms aloud, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The cuniforms on the ancient scroll held the wisdom of a bygone era.
meanings.sent5: The scribe carefully inscribed the cuniforms on the clay tablet.

meanings.definition: Wedge-shaped characters used in ancient writing systems.
meanings.sent1: The scholar deciphered the meaning of the intricate cuniforms.
meanings.sent2: Ancient scribes carefully carved cuniforms into stone tablets.
meanings.sent3: The children drew funny faces using cuniforms as noses.
meanings.sent4: The cuniforms seemed to dance across the page, telling stories of old.
meanings.sent5: The intricate cuniforms were like tiny puzzles waiting to be solved.
